item.title: LA fires live updates: 1,400 firefighters battling 'unprecedented' fires, Newsom says
item.description: At least 30,000 people are under evacuation order as the Palisades Fire spreads.

item.title: WATCH: ABC TV reporter battles ‘vicious’ winds amid LA fires
item.description: Leanne Suter, of ABC News' Los Angeles station KABC, reports from the Eaton Fire in Southern California.

item.title: WATCH: Belle the service dog meets Disney Princess Belle in a 'tail' as old as time
item.description: They really are "Beauty and the Beast."

item.title: Court reissues warrant for impeached South Korean president, who remains at residence
item.description: Seoul Western District Court on Tuesday night reissued a warrant to detain impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol.

item.title: What’s in Jack Smith’s final report on the Trump probes? Filings provide some clues
item.description: Filings by Donald Trump's lawyers suggest that Jack Smith's final report on his two probes could contain details that are potentially damaging to the ...
